question: Consider the real-world 3D location of the objects. Which object is closer to the camera?
question_with_options:
Consider the real-world 3D location of the objects. Which object is closer to the camera?
A. red sports car on the left
B. red car on the right
C. None
D. None

options.A: red sports car on the left

triage_reason: The red car on the right is closer to the camera than the red sports car on the left, as it is positioned nearer to the foreground and appears larger in the frame, but judging this accurately from a 2D image requires depth perception cues that are ambiguous without a depth map.
